name: Night In The Opera Full
description:
Play a detective keen in snooker and match 3 games to solve this mystery whodunit filled with intrigue! Deep in this adventure game with awesome hidden object scenes.

Features of this hidden objects adventure game:

- Solve a murder mystery in a classic mystery detective game
- Collect evidence in beautifully crafted hidden object scenes
- Play addicting pool game and master your bubble shooter skills
- Choose your preferred game mode: snooker, gem slider or match 3 games
- Earn gold to purchase powerful bonuses and achieve
- Enjoy classical music as you progress through the storyline

When an opera Diva, Beatrice Agnès, is found dead after a sensational first night performance, you are summoned to investigate this murder mystery. Was it a jealous admirer, an envious rival, or a desperate entrepreneur? All characters might have a motive to make the renowned Prima leave the stage once for all. So, since the theatre personnel are unaware of the crime, you decide to merge with the crowd and listen to gossips.

Go down to the stage, billiard and makeup room to discover different mini-game modes - Match 3, Bubble Shooter and Snooker. When you are familiar with game basics, you will be free to play whatever puzzle game you like to proceed on the story. If you prefer bubble games, join the gentlemen over the pool game and master your bubble shooting skills. If you prefer cubis and jewel matching games, than Gem Slider might be an option. As you make your way through 90+ puzzle and arcade levels, you will earn coins to buy bonuses which appear useful whatever mode you choose.

Take a break of puzzle and search for evidence in rich seek-and-find locations, which all hidden object games fan will love. The items you find are actually the bonuses that then facilitate your task in snooker and match 3 levels. And of course, no detective games can do without tricky contraptions, safe cracking, expert examinations and other mind-twisting mini-games to enrich your playing experience.

So, if you like free puzzle games, then install this version of Night in the Opera, and unlock the full adventure from within the game. Put your logic and matching skills to unmask the villain in this classic detective game.
